评论详情: Stylish frames , could be a little more sturdy but over all good value for the money. Very classy and clean looking

-This retro oval sunglasses is nice and trendy. -It is relatively lightweight and feels comfortable on. -I ordered the silver frame with grey lens and the silver is a little too shiny for my liking but if you like the look, go ahead. -The material appears decent, it is not flimsy and it should not break easily. -I have a fairly large face and this glasses fit me snug. -Overall, this sunglasses is decent for the price.

These sunglasses are super cute.  I like things that are different and these have a great retro shape and metal rims.  I chose the black and grey color.  They go with anything I wear and I've already had lots of compliments.  They are very light and comfortable  to wear and they come with a pouch, a cleaning cloth and a key chain screw driver so you'll always be ready if you need to tighten one of the screws. These glasses also are said to block 100% of UVA and UVB rays so they do a great job protecting my eyes.  They come in lots of color combos so I may just order a few more.
Love these glasses

评论概述: So chic and I love it
评论详情: I was not expected that this sunglass would be this perfect. It arrived in a nice box that includes of small key chain screws that you can use if at anytime any of the screws are loose and you need to tight them. The sunglass is so chic and it looks so luxury in person. I think it's definitely worth it specially that it's so light and you can have it on for hours and it doesn't leave any marks or spots on your nose/face.

These Breaksun Retro Oval Sunglasses look like they are a throwback to the late 90's or early 2000's to me. They seem well-made in general. I'm not sure how well or long they will hold up, depends on whether the frame was simply painted black or not. It is hard to tell at this point. They are fairly cute "on." (and I'm pretty picky about sunglasses on me.) The lenses are very dark/black, so no one can really see your eyes through these, but you can see fine looking out through them though (not distractingly dark to peer through...) The lenses are clear to look through (meaning not foggy looking, seem like a good lens). The nose pads sit evenly on my nose bridge. (I always worry about that with sunglasses with nose pads to them.)  I think these sunglasses are cute in person, and I would get them again, but I think next time would opt for this same style sunglasses, but I might try the silver frame rather than the completely black ones.  Both are cool looking though. Can't go wrong! Note: These come with a little storage bag and a key chain glasses screwdriver, which is a nice "extra" for tightening up  the screws in your frame as needed.

评论概述: Relive the 90s! [Breaksun’s Retro Oval Sunglasses in Black/Gray]
评论详情: Breaksun’s Retro Oval Sunglasses in Black/Gray are a very nice fit for those with a flatter bridge (aka “Asian fit”).  They fit snugly on my medium sized head, but since there isn’t an expandable hinge at the temples, those with larger heads will want to pass.  Construction is decent and this is valued fairly at $14.99.  This pair really does remind me of my old 90s glasses.  Comes with a cleaning cloth, eyeglass screwdriver, and a bag for storage.

These shades are super cute and lightweight. They came with cleaning cloth, carrying pouch, and little screwdriver keychain which are all very convenient. I like how it fits and the small size makes it easy to carry around. I would recommend these sunglasses.

I love the style of these oval sunglasses! They are a much different shape than I normally go for and I was pleasantly surprised with them. The quality is great and overall thy are a nice change to my normal everyday sunglasses! They will be a cute accessory to have in my collection.

My wife likes this sunglass. It is lightweight and easy to put on. It block the UV and make her eyes feel more comfortable when she is outside. The sunglass is stylish and easy to match any hair styles. Like it!

It's nice to have options with your sunglasses.  This style will fit with most any outfit.  Just chose your color and go from their.  They come with a small repair tool to tighten things up if necessary, as well as a cloth case and cleaning cloth.

These sunglasses add a bit of flare and not just the plain sun glasses. The gold bows and other touches add a classy touch. They are nice sunglasses and provide the protection needed for your eyes. Good buy. For your eyes, your pocketbook and your sense of style!

These are stylish but way to big/wide for.my.face so it looks awkward and I probably won't be wearing them unfortunately. They also seem to be crooked. They sit at a tilt on my face and I don't think I've had that issue with any other glasses so it can't be me/my ears

The sunglasses are nice and retro with the oval lenses. The gold metal is unique for sunglasses. I like the dark grey lenses. The glasses also came with a cleaning cloth, a screw driver tool for glasses and a case for carrying. What a great find.
The photo will say it all - BOTH the silver and gold arrived shiny but the photos show matte - big difference in look if you ask me. I won't wear them so shiny!

评论概述: Nicely packaged and and generally a good design. Retro...? Maybe. Maybe not.
评论详情: This is the second pair of sunglasses I've seen like this. Though both seem almost (not quite) identical, these come with vastly better packaging; it includes a screwdriver to adjust the sunglasses, a soft carrying case, a cloth to clean the lenses, and more.  The lenses are great. Everything looks brighter, but less glare-y than with my other sunglasses. The lenses are flawless, too; no weird distortions.  The frames are okay, but not quite retro. (I've worked in fashion, so I'm kind of finicky about the use of the term "retro.")  My only real gripe is the hinges on these sunglasses. The metal around them has fairly sharp edges, and it's important to keep that in mind when taking them off. Otherwise, it's easy to pinch your hand as you fold the glasses to put them in their carrying case.  I'm rating these sunglasses four-stars because I love the lenses and the company packaged them very thoughtfully. I'm just not a fan of the hinges on them.

These oval sunglasses are a dupe of Celene Triomphe sunnies. They are nice quality for the price, the lens is clear to see through and the metal isn't flimsy. Definitely worth a buy if you want the trend but not the huge price tag!

评论概述: New daily wear. Comfortable and stylish
评论详情: I've been testing and wearing these for a couple of weeks now and these are my new go to pairs that I keep in the car. I love that they aren't too dramatic and can match with everything, while being unique enough that they don't look like every other pair of Aviators or regular full rimmed sunnies. The quality is top-notch, they have some weight to them and I do find my self adjusting them from time to time. The lenses aren't SUPER dark but i do feel comfortable enough to drive or walk around in buildings with these on. They don't pinch but the wide arms did press down on my ears a tiny bit. Other than that these are quite fun to wear for short periods of time.
The quality is very nice. I liked the fit of these as they’ll match with about anything. They came in a nice soft case that protected them well.
Really good quality but also light weight. I have the “real” designer version of these and they’re nearly identical without the branding. So good!!
These sunglasses are really cute. They’re just like the Chloe ones except without the markings obviously
These are extra dark lenses. The frame is flattering. I suspect it's not the strongest frame but it looks fine. Functional inexpensive sunglasses.
Very well made and durable. It looks really stylish. I have a round face and it looks good on me.

Unlike a lot of other sunglasses at this price point, these are made of a metal frame. This gives them more durability and makes adjustments easier - I have a larger head and so usually have to bend the arms outward some. On plastic frames this necessitates a heat gun, but with metal frames there's enough give to do it with my bare hands. Breaksun also included a mini keychain screwdriver with hex, philips, and flat heads which is nice if you ever need to repair your sunglasses or glasses on the go. The only real improvement I can think of would be a hard case instead of the soft bag that's included.
Sturdy hinges. Comfortable nose pieces and the bows do not irritate my skin. The tinting on these sunglasses is just dark enough for eye protection. Comes with soft case and cleaning cloth.

These glasses are very comfortable and lightweight. I wasn't sure if I'd like the thick sides but they actually look really nice. The tint on them is dark enough for my very light sensitive light blue eyes. I also like the dark tint makes it hard to see my eyes through them. Overall, I highly recommend these glasses. The style is contemporary and a change to the usual aviator style I wear.

Hello friends, I selected these retro oval sunglasses in vintage gold Brown for a housemate.My housemate got a kick out of these sunglasses.  She says that they remind her of a Bond villain from the Sean Connery era.  She likes the unusual eye shape.  They are very European.  These particular sunglasses have nose pieces that need to be adjusted to your nose.  They're a very fun shape and should look good on any face type.

I have these in so many colors, and absolutely love them!  These particular ones are such great quality!  Well packaged, come with cloth and sleeve, and well made!  This particular style fits my large head best, but I think they look good on most.  10/10
